title: feat: support a root el param in getOffset position util
Update grunt-contrib-uglify to version 3.0.1 üöÄ
body:
| üö®üî•‚ö†Ô∏è _Action required_: Switch to the new [Greenkeeper](https://git.io/uptodate) now! üö®üî•‚ö†Ô∏è | | --- | | This version of Greenkeper will be __shutdown on May 31st.__ | | With [Integrations](https://developer.github.com/early-access/integrations/) **first-class bot support** landed on GitHub and we‚Äôve rewritten Greenkeeper to take full advantage of it. **Simpler setup, fewer pull-requests, faster than ever**.

--- Hello lovely humans, [grunt-contrib-uglify](https://www.npmjs.com/package/grunt-contrib-uglify) just published its new version 3.0.1.
State Update :rocket:
Dependency grunt-contrib-uglify
New version 3.0.1
Type devDependency
This version is **not covered** by your **current version range**. Without accepting this pull request your project will work just like it did before. There might be a bunch of new features, fixes and perf improvements that the maintainers worked on for you though. I recommend you look into these changes and try to get onto the latest version of grunt-contrib-uglify. Given that you have a decent test suite, a passing build is a strong indicator that you can take advantage of these changes by merging the proposed change into your project. Otherwise this branch is a great starting point for you to work on the update. Do you have any ideas how I could improve these pull requests? Did I report anything you think isn‚Äôt right? Are you unsure about how things are supposed to work? There is a collection of [frequently asked questions](https://greenkeeper.io/faq.html) and while I‚Äôm just a bot, there is a group of people who are happy to teach me new things. [Let them know](https://github.com/greenkeeperio/greenkeeper/issues/new). Good luck with your project :sparkles: You rock! :palm_tree: --- The new version differs by 24 commits . - [`2773e7e`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/2773e7ea1332d12bd17fed8f186aa196f04caea3) v3.0.1. - [`85a1ac3`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/85a1ac32673b7ed49bcd00be39368cf558759ac5) fix typo - [`755360b`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/755360bee66c9d5a43650be7e82a88d88fca293b) Move `require()` up - [`0f45e4e`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/0f45e4ed3bf18088071b54b672a6be09966fda51) v3.0.0. - [`ccd7ad0`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/ccd7ad0efd8959fb1753c78e8010f8e21cbab6c9) Upgrade to uglify-js 3.0.4. (#472) - [`f3086c1`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/f3086c1da1edc284c767b12b7f5c08c5b1c07319) v2.3.0. - [`7dc5e1d`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/7dc5e1daf473e57786d9f1a921e935fc3bef203b) Log fixes. (#454) r=vladikoff - [`48fab36`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/48fab3616e3fc077ead7fd33e3b3f34bafddf2bc) v2.2.1. - [`f161c6d`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/f161c6de9f40b6cf719a5220dc8c8d5ac6ecaddb) Clean up banner option. - [`bbe1da0`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/bbe1da07fbdb67b40feca0baa602762ec560850c) Update test files. - [`3a718cf`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/3a718cfbb89abf70289e687d1e624c936259c3cd) Update uglify-overview.md - [`a34af0d`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/a34af0d31a7520ebd72bd5bb42fa2ff3e9ea6adb) Merge pull request #453 from gruntjs/update-uglify - [`48247f6`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/48247f680a2aa62643828d40521d0cdd4fd050fe) v2.2.0. - [`0f638cf`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/0f638cf45e07daa997ee9cbf782f1365400747ac) Update uglify-js to v2.8.3. - [`463d4d3`](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/commit/463d4d30655a8eec163fee575c5e42f7f3b18ef9) Update docs. There are 24 commits in total. See the [full diff](https://github.com/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify/compare/2d04f24e347cd6429856516385d61673a94d57ae...2773e7ea1332d12bd17fed8f186aa196f04caea3).

title: chore: component.isReaady = false on destroy
body: In order to keep it nice and clean (and consistent) the `isReady` flag is set to false once each component gets destroyed.
